message: Pin versions in apt get install. Instead of `apt-get install <package>` use `apt-get install <package>=<version>`
Use COPY instead of ADD for files and folders
Use COPY instead of ADD for files and folders
Pin versions in pip. Instead of `pip install <package>` use `pip install <package>==<version>` or `pip install --requirement <requirements file>`
Avoid use of cache directory with pip. Use `pip install --no-cache-dir <package>`
Ranges can only match single chars (mentioned due to duplicates).
Use WORKDIR to switch to a directory
Avoid use of wget without progress bar. Use `wget --progress=dot:giga <url>`.Or consider using `-q` or `-nv` (shorthands for `--quiet` or `--no-verbose`).
Use WORKDIR to switch to a directory
Remove surrounding $() to avoid executing output.
